name: Pazuru
description:
Use your ninja reflexes to solve puzzles in this easy to learn, hard to master puzzle game. Twist, bounce, warp and toggle your way through the levels. Collect all the stars and be a true ninja master!

Game features: Over 70 brain-twisting levels Create custom levels with the built-in level editor Share levels online and offline via QR Code
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
